channel.title: nettest on OONI: Open Observatory of Network Interference
channel.description: Recent content in nettest on OONI: Open Observatory of Network Interference

item.title: OONI releases new Web Connectivity test for detecting online censorship
item.description: Today the Open Observatory of Network Interference (OONI) is excited to be releasing a brand new test, called Web Connectivity, which is designed to detect three different types of censorship: DNS tampering, TCP/IP blocking and HTTP blocking. Advantages of running Web Connectivity This test allows us to see which websites are blocked and how, more accurately than ever before! Previously we relied on running separate (http_request, dns_consistency and tcp_connect) tests with the aim of identifying various forms of censorship.
